name: Peggy's Oven Fried Fish
ingredients: 1-2 teaspoons Seasoning Salt, or seasoning of your choice

instructions.en: Line a large baking sheet with foil and rub with the oil to coat.
Mix the crushed pork rinds and seasoning in a shallow bowl or pie plate.
Coat each piece of fish with mayonnaise on both sides.
Cover the mayonnaise-coated fish on both sides with the seasoned pork rind crumbs.
Bake at 450Â°F for about 15-20 minutes or until the fish is crispy and cooked through. It's not necessary to flip the fish over during baking.

notes: You'll need at least 3 pieces of fish to make 3 servings. The original recipe used 6 filets that were small and weighed between 2 1/4 and 3 1/4 ounces each. Adjust cooking time based on the thickness of your fish filets.
